授業目的: 本授業の目的は、受講者が中級程度の内容のフランス語を聞き、話す力を身につけ，自立した言語使用者となることである。
到達目標: 本授業では、受講者が、フランス語の複雑な会話やニュースや講演の概要を聞き取り、それについて話すことができることを到達目標とする。
授業方法: The course will rely on various ways. We will use a textbook of French as a Foreign Language (FLE), and advance chapter by chapter. Those chapters consist of a variety of contents: short texts (not longer than 20 lines),  taken from newspapers and magazines; oral recordings of daily life conversations; very short audiovisual materials (a couple of minutes); simplified grammatical explanations; lists of vocabulary pertaining to daily life matters. The instructor will ask the students to do a selection of exercises from the book, written or oral. Those exercises include conversations in class, role playing, They are usually done during class, without any specific preparation. The only regular homework (apart from specific written work to be graded, 3 or 4 times during the semester), is to review the new acquisitions every week which include the new elements brought to by the instructor, who will write quite a lot on the blackboard.

トピック.授業計画1: Reading: oral questions of comprehension - oral questions about oneself's habits and daily life topics  - daily life conversations through role playing in small groups - Grammar and vocabulary exercises. Introducing some discussions about topical issues in nowadays French society.
トピック.授業外学習2:
Review the new acquisitions (lists of vocabulary, grammatical rules) - carefully reread the notes taken during class.

3 or 4 times during the semester, a written homework will be asked: write a dozen of lines on a topic related to daily life, or answer a couple of practical questions, or express you own point of view over a topical and social issue...

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 2 oral test of 3 to 5 minutes conducted in-class by the instructor (in the middle and at the end of the semester)
成績評価Grading2: 授業外学修課題／Assignment, homework required outside class (06)
3 written homework during the semester (15% each)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
Attendance and active participation in class.
